amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit CARA funds from being used for the establishment or management of a national monument designated after 1995 under the Antiquities Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 106-612 to prohibit funds from being used in the Act for the establishment or management of a national monument designated after 1995 under the Antiquities Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chenoweth-Hage amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 265 (Roll no. 164).
